name: googlebooks-app
description: A book search engine that allows users to find and save books to a personal list. Powered by the Google Books API, built using the MERN stack. and featuring Apollo Server & GraphQL.

scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "cd server && node server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Richard Zhang
